  freestar.queue = freestar.queue || [];
  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="18471" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="18471" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.75</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="11591">11,591</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="1154"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Invictus</b> by <b>Rabanne</b> is a Woody Aquatic fragrance for men. <b>Invictus</b> was launched in 2013. Invictus was created by Veronique Nyberg, Anne Flipo, Olivier Polge and Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Sea Notes, Grapefruit and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Bay Leaf and Jasmine; base notes are Ambergris, Guaiac Wood, Oakmoss and Patchouli. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Paco Rabanne launches Invictus, its new fragrance for men, which represents fresh and sporty creation in relation to the other perfumes of the house. The fragrance comes out in July 2013. Invictus, which is Latin for "invincible," represents power, dynamism and energy.</p>

<p></p>

<p>The fragrance opens with fresh grapefruit and a marine accord that lead to the heart of aromatic bay leaf and Hedione jasmine and a woody base of guaiac wood, patchouli, oak moss and ambergris.
</p>

<p>
The bottle is designed in the form of a trophy. The fragrance is available as 50 and 100 ml Eau de Toilette with an accompanying collection.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2360527"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2360527#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2354216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256848">Overdrive</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Copied more times than Tysons bob and weave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2354216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2354216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352903" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352903" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Milkman212"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327366"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Milkman212" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352903ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352903" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327366">Milkman212</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very overhated frangrance. People complain about any paco rabbane fragrance. In my couple months of fragrance collecting i found that Invictus reigns supreme over most. Out of the 120 designer fragrances i smelt invictus is definitely my top 10. This sweet captivating smell (although synthetic) gives it a great vibe. I love this smell my dad wears this all the time maybe that why I like it so much the way i would describe the smell is your riding your bicycle with some friends in a nice summer day and you go to the local shop to buy a orange and pineapple drink. If you want to have a great day summer and spring frag then this is a must pick even if its generic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2352903"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2352903#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2346869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346869" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussiandehermes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2107198.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussiandehermes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/XJ-1861-Naxos-30529.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30529.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="XJ 1861 Naxos"title="XJ 1861 Naxos"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346869ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346869" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2107198">venussiandehermes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 16:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love the smell of bay leaves. When I smell this cologne, my nose tells me that I am smelling a bay leaf by the sea. Then I feel a citrusy sweetness. I can only perceive the synthetic bubble gum smell in the scent when I think of it as smelling like that. <br />
<br />
Conditioning has a great effect on the sense of smell and the associations of smells. The bay leaf scent in Invictus may be causing this perfume to be perceived as synthetic. The smell of bay leaves is really interesting. I have heard from a few people who smelled bay leaves that bay leaves have a smell similar to plastic. According to this comment, when I smell bay leaves, I can smell plastic as well. <br />
<br />
My advice to friends who will try this perfume for the first time is to smell the perfume without paying attention to synthetic and bubble gum conditioning. I think it is very easy to like Invictus. A perfume created for general appreciation is exactly that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2346869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2346869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341982" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341982" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HKarrer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892563"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892563.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HKarrer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341982ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341982" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); Not very complex, but smells very good and isn't cloying at all. Very unique and distinctive smell to me. It's not like a "blue" type fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2341982"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2341982#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337200" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2311362" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kortik"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2109436"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2109436.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kortik" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2311362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2311362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); Lovely masculine bubblegum, where i get alot of patchouli and oakmoss in the base. For a good price its definitely still a good fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2311362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2311362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304995" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304995" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moshpitbunny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884658"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1884658.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moshpitbunny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Duelle-Eau-de-Toilette-9241.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9241.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"title="Eau Duelle Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304995ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304995" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1884658">Moshpitbunny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 14:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>**Woman's POV*** <br />
<br />
My favourite ever mens scent, my taste in mens scents may be basic (my favourite before this one was the original one million) idc it smells GOOD. <br />
<br />
This smells almost just like the original One Million before the reformulations, its now just a watered down with honey and sweet water mess of what it was. Fresh, sexy, aquatic with some creamy qualities.. soo snuggly. Im sensitive to very aromatic scents and this one is just so lovely. <br />
<br />
Basically the original One Million sexy sweet musky base with Marine Notes, no sharp edges.<br />
<br />
Fianc gets so many compliments when he wears this he complains he needs to stop wearing it so take that how you will. <br />
<br />
If you want her to hold on a bit longer during that hug goodbye at the end of a date wear this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2304995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2304995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304262" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tkkrastev"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229809"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2229809.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tkkrastev" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zimaya/Amber-Is-Great-82728.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82728.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Is Great"title="Amber Is Great"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2229809">tkkrastev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 00:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>- Cool summer in a bottle / A good daytime fragrance -<br />
I actually got familiar with this scent by testing some good dupes.. (Have in mind that I'm more of a heavy, sweet, twisted, smoky and complicated perfume type of guy..)<br />
It's fresh, well balanced, fruity, summery, marine scent.<br />
It's so Rabanne if I may say... but it's not pretentious like other Rabanne scents.<br />
It's youthful, "the cool college guy type of scent.." It's not so overbearing, cause it's stays in the personal space of the user, but it sits nice on the skin and projects nicely closely around. You can get a wiff in the first 3-4 hour if you cross paths with an Invictus guy.<br />
I mentally put this in the "beginner friendly" staples with some other scents. (CK have some amazing juices for beginners) I like it cause it shows you care how you smell, but it does just that. Not more.<br />
For me that sits on the line between the good boy and the playboy. That's for the person wearing Yellow at the Tinder party (where people dress acordingly: green - single; yellow - it's complicated; red - taken/not interested)<br />
<br />
Overall: 7/10; Vibes: Feel-good, Safe, Summery, Youthful, Fresh</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2304262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2304262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303801" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301078" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="semyonsemyoff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2087624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="semyonsemyoff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-Bottled-383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss Bottled"title="Boss Bottled"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301078ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301078" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2087624">semyonsemyoff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 05:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I first had Invictus Intense. Comparing the two, this one is more wearable, the other is sickeningly sweet. This one opens with fresh sweetness. Many said it's bubblegummy - yes, exactly. Not quite sure what bubblegum, but it has this minty touch. Invictus Intense had this very present bay leaf note. Here it's not so evident. Perhaps you can dig out jasmine. The top citrus notes remind me of Acqua di Gio a little bit. It's definately something rather common.<br />
<br />
Good sillage, good longevity. Quite memorable. But for me it's just so "OK". I haven't been so indifferent to a fragrance for a while. The DNA doesn't tingle any senses for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2301078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2301078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299496" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; clean,i wear it often on summer warm days</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2299496"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2299496#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PolaFragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2085019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PolaFragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); That said it smells really really good!<br />
There is really no substitute for it eitherthere is no other perfume out there that capture this candy like scent. <br />
But as I said, Im to oldbut I found a solution.<br />
This now comes in a deo body spray, its a bit milder and do not have the monster projection of the cologne. This is now my go to for a little spray on body this is a use my wife appreciates as it comes to life when we become intimate.<br />
For use like this its for everyone!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2271259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2271259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2266081" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2157424">Masonb2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-24">08/24/24 11:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really soapy smelling. Doesnt last long</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2259606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2259606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250287" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250287" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kojii"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044330"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2044330.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kojii" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250287ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250287" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2044330">kojii</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 09:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>People just love to hate on things, this is actually solid. Not to my taste, but objectively good. It also does not focus as heavily on sweetness as everyone else seems to say. The opening is citrus forward and I get a little bit of that "bubblegum sweetness", then it dries down to a very salty (The saltiness dies after about 30 minutes), musky and clean scent. 7+ hours longevity and decent projection. 70 CAD for 100ml at the designer level is an amazing deal, and you get a long lasting fresh and clean fragrance. It gets the job done. I have other fresh and clean fragrances I like more so I'll be selling this, but I would definitely suggest getting your nose on this and seeing if you like it. It's worth the money and definitely a good fragrance; there's a reason it was both worn and cloned to death.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2250287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2250287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249034" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragance_Snow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2221719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragance_Snow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221719">Fragance_Snow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 10:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honest review (rating 7/10):<br />
<br />
The first thing you smell as you apply is a citrusy, marine and musky smell. I dont smell the bubblegum others review. For example, some Jean Paul Gaultier fragances have a bubblegum aspect I would rather describe as sweet but this Invictus is not sweet. A great fragrance back in 2013 but today there are too many similar fragrances going for this same type of smell.<br />
<br />
This is a masculine fragrance great for summer everyday use and maybe even office. Depending on sprays, last about 6 hours on my skin. Projects well the first few hours then its closer to skin. I suggest trying other more modern complex fragrances before buying.<br />
<br />
Remember that fragrance preferences are subjective and may perform differently on each person skin, give it a try ;)<br />
<br />
Regards,<br />
Snow</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2249034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2249034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242858" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tae09"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2153605"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tae09" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2153605">Tae09</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 11:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh aromatic fragrance. I pick up musk, citrus and maybe some spicy notes. Its on the stronger side so proceed with caution. It leans masculine but depending on how you pair it a woman could also pull this off. Depending on the man it could be a special occasion or every day scent. Could be a night or day fragrance. Could be a summer fragrance because of the citrus and freshness but could easily be a dinner scent because of the musky undertones. I like this and I would give it a 7.5/10 but on a man it could easily be an 8 or 9/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2242858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2242858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239668" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I got nothing beyond this after 1.5hrs. Shame, because the opening is a solid 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2239668"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2239668#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236528" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moyashi04"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1974296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moyashi04" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236528ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236528" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296">Moyashi04</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-02">08/02/24 06:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good marine fragrance. Just a splash of the sea and a little citrus to go along with it. I found this somewhat overbearing. So I would suggest going easy on the trigger. This does get compliments, yes. It is kind of different in it's respective area so there is a high chance that you will turn some heads with this. Nothing too crazy though, do not expect some niche fragrance quality from this.<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2236528"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2236528#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234819" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bgeer83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171034"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bgeer83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171034">bgeer83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-31">07/31/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The snobbery in the fragrance community is next level. My eyes almost got stuck into place into my from rolling them while reading some of these reviews. <br />
This is a great choice for a young man looking to turn some heads. Even at 40 this is still my go-to for concerts or any similar type outdoor event. The formulation over the years has made it so that it isnt so strong on my skin anymore but it still gets the job done across the board. Seeing as how Hawas is now a bit more expensive, it makes more sense to go with this as its a more well rounded fragrance. Go get a sample (as you should always do first) and see for yourself. Forget the snobs. Theyre just as miserable as the tone in their reviews would suggest.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2234819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2234819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2223799" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2223799" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ulfkristersson"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198038"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2198038.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ulfkristersson" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-Qahwa-88175.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88175.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khamrah Qahwa"title="Khamrah Qahwa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2223799ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2223799" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2198038">Ulfkristersson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-19">07/19/24 18:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For being a Paco robanne its not bad. I would say more but to be honest its not much to talk about. Its sweet citrus fragrance that would work in many occasions. This is the first ever serious purchase of a fragrance that started my addiction to fragrances. This would be pulled of at work or outside during the day. If its clicks with your skin chem maybe during night out as well. But its not something special. Its really good not gonna lie but its gets boring after awhile. Would still recommend for someone that dont have many or any fragrances to begin with.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2223799"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2223799#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218164" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218164" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ideal.my.fav"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256672"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ideal.my.fav" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus"title="Invictus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218164ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218164" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256672">ideal.my.fav</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 03:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the most nose blinding fragrance in the market with others like sauvage edt, ysl y edp, dylan blue edt, aventus edp and goes on...<br />
<br />
The way it smells in the air is unbeatable and might be the best. half a spray to left hand filled the whole house but when I use it everyday i completely get nose blind and i cant feel its projection nor longevity. But when i give a break and come back to it oh boy<br />
<br />
Longevity 12+ hours<br />
projection nuclear<br />
scent 10/10 in the air 7/10 when you smell upclose<br />
versatility 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2218164"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2218164#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2009743">Fury30</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 08:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pros: <br />
 Long lasting;<br />
 Great projection for a fresh scent;<br />
 My girlfriend's favourite fragrance, even when compared to more popular expensive designer and niche fragrances. <br />
<br />
Cons: <br />
May be too syntheyic and cloying for some people;<br />
 Fragrance enthusiastics may not be impressed by this scent profile.<br />
<br />
Overall Score: 8,7/10.<br />
It is a nostalgic fragrance for me and i will always keep a bottle for those Summer days. Some may hate it, others love it. I'm one of those who love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2215264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2215264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2214259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A very youthful summer scent that gets hate due to its popularity but, it is still a classic and sells for a reason. Not the most unique but that's not its purpose (sweet, generic, fresh). <br />
<br />
Lasts around 6-7 hours at a soft-medium projection using a good amount of sprays (8 sprays). Less sprays give less performance obviously.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2214259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2214259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2213023" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195016" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rei_Likes_Pears"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172589"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rei_Likes_Pears" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2172589">Rei_Likes_Pears</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-21">06/21/24 06:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's one of those "classics" that went big, up there with the 1 Millions, Sauvages, Eroses, Bleu de Chanels, but now are burned out and just absolutely boring and trigger antipathy when you catch someone wearing them. <br />
<br />
Younger people's perfume, if you're getting older, avoid this. I could go on about how good performance is and how it easily lasts 12 plus hours, but I'd skip that part. If you are reading this review in 2024, there's a 99% chance you already know this perfume. Rumbling about what you already know is unnecessary. More so that I don't recommend this one at all.<br />
<br />
Was a good one in it's prime, but now just avoid at all costs!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2195016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2195016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193546" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2165534" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CxL908"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2123586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CxL908" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2165534ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2165534" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2123586">CxL908</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-23">05/23/24 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not much to say, it's sweet, fresh and pulls complements. Easy "dumb reach" unless you hate those type of fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2165534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2165534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163700" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2148812" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="samudex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1627487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="samudex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Ra-ed-Silver-75900.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75900.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ra'ed Silver"title="Ra'ed Silver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2148812ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2148812" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1627487">samudex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-07">05/07/24 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mandarin Orange, Grapefruit, Sea Notes, Bay Leaf, Ambergris. It's like mint bubblegum with ambroxan. It has elements from citrus, blue and sweet fragrances, but it doesnt fit any category. Easy to use for day and summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2148812"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2148812#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147955" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147955" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SenselessReviews"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307154.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SenselessReviews" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147955ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147955" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307154">SenselessReviews</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 19:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you enjoy sniffing the gonorrheaic discharge dripping from the tip of Pauly Shore's penis, great news! You can replicate that experience with "Invictus."<br />
<br />
There is a reason "Invictus" takes more crap than two girls and their cup. It is the fragrance equivalent of a flabby gym teacher whose back rolls droop when he catches a Nerf ball. It transforms you into a moody, sweaty mess, sitting alone writing Steven Seagal fan fiction and edgier alternate endings to "Full House" episodes.<br />
<br />
Worse yet, all of that ambergris puckers up your nostrils like Mick Jagger swigging vinegar. The patchouli is like a rectal itch you can't scratch until you are safely alone in the shower. The oakmoss smells like your hyper cousin's breath after he burped the alphabet.<br />
<br />
We are now on the 77th flanker for "Invictus." Paco Rabanne is a flanker hoe. All I can say is that the further we move away from the OG, the better!<br />
<br />
Manliness Ranking: Jason Statham confronting his trauma without any firearms</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2147955"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2147955#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It does smell good but its a very bubblegum esq scent. I dont really get marine vibes considering how strong of bubblegum this is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2127734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2127734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;         </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2122275"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2122275#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2115445" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1972631">gl0ry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a 50ml bottle for 40 and it's defo worth it. At the start it is like sitting at the beach and drinking an Orange juice. Then it shifts to a more Lake-ish and foresty scent. I don't like the Bay leaf, but other than thats it is good. After that it just becomes a little bit generic freshy scent. I get around 6-7 hours of longevity and decent sillage. Overall if you can get it at a deal it is worth it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2115445"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2115445#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101372" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saveria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saveria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Casmir-348.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.348.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Casmir"title="Casmir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747">Saveria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-23">03/23/24 02:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Although this perfume is very classic, it is nonetheless pleasant.<br />
<br />
It's a very beautiful marine fragrance combined with a lovely citrus scent. Yes, it's true, there's nothing revolutionary here, but it smells good and that's what I ask from a perfume.<br />
<br />
You don't always have to do something complicated to make something pretty...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2101372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2101372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2098402" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Amazing Bubble gum sweetness with fresh aquatic notes and citrus. I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2093163"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2093163#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2091900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2091900" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Douggie T-Ray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907000"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1907000.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Douggie T-Ray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Oud-Wood-1826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Wood"title="Oud Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2091900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2091900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1907000">Douggie T-Ray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-13">03/13/24 20:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My Wife bought me a traveller of this, out of the blue - not sure why she picked that one. I usually prefer something a bit more mature, but its decent for hot days when you are out and about, and want to smell fresh without drawing too much attention. I was surprised by the longevity. I put 2 sprays on my neck and one on my arm early in the morning, and I could still smell it wafting off me after dinner that night. The bubble gum note is a little odd to me, but its not unpleasant if you dont spray too much. Smells clean, and sometimes thats enough.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2091900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2091900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2079325" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
