padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2075484" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ambatuspray"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932184"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1932184.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ambatuspray" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2075484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2075484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932184">ambatuspray</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-27">02/27/24 03:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Invictus is a great school/work/everyday fragrance, it's sweet, fresh and citrusy. If you really like these type of scents, go for it. Just do not overspray though. Small warning though, as many others have said, they cannot pick up some of the notes/accords in this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2075484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2075484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072607" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="smelling.sniffing.swan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1892188.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="smelling.sniffing.swan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072607ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072607" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1892188">smelling.sniffing.swan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Look, its a basic designer perfume for teenage boys.<br />
And it isnt pretending to be anything else, whether thats a good thing or a bad thing is up to you.<br />
<br />
Its simple, too sweet and immature, yet Im still drawn to it. Maybe nostalgia? But theres something kinda glamorous about the scent. Its pretty polished, and definitely attractive.<br />
<br />
Theres hardly a distinct or distinguishable note that might be found in nature, which is a drawback for me, but on the other hand it is smoothly blended.<br />
<br />
VERDICT: A good dumb reach. Too sweet for me, but I cant help but enjoy this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2072607"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2072607#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063282" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2063282" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cioraniada"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150027"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1150027.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cioraniada" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male"title="Le Male"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2063282ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2063282" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150027">Cioraniada</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-15">02/15/24 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice after shower scent when youre going grocery shopping. It smells like how kool aid tastes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2063282"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2063282#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2062292" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2062292" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jackm27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2010535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jackm27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2062292ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2062292" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2010535">jackm27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 13:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sickly sweet and citrusy, definitely not for me but I could see the appeal for certain people. Definitely smell before you buy it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2062292"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2062292#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061858" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jeremy_Wael_Fragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006040"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2006040.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jeremy_Wael_Fragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006040">Jeremy_Wael_Fragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 06:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very synthetic fragrance, although I do like the dry-down, which has a bubble-gum note. Most likely appeals to a more casual setting, but you could also wear this to school or work. Would buy again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2061858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2061858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061713" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rafayvirk12"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1840765"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="rafayvirk12" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1840765">rafayvirk12</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-14">02/14/24 02:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>opening: Paco rabbane Invictus opens up with a lot of grapefruit and aquatic notes, You can definitely see similarities with the opening of this fragrances with other blue fragrances openings. However it does smell very synthetic even after the alcohol disipates.<br />
<br />
Mid: In my opinion the mid is definitely the most enjoyable part about this fragrance. It has a great balance between sweetness and freshness which makes it great for warm weather but you could also probably pull this off in the colder weather. It smells very bubble gummy.<br />
<br />
Base. I was quite disappointed smelling this after it dried down. It still has the bubbly gummy aspect to it but there is an extremely sharp, potent, headache-inducing synthetic smell that lies there. My guess is that it could probably be the ambergris that comes off this way. I tried to ignore it and focus on the sweetness but it;s just so sharp you can't ignore it. The base is really what makes this fragrance unwearable in my opinion. Do try it on your skin first because on your skin it may smell different.<br />
<br />
Performance. Performance is solid. You can spray a lot of this stuff on and it won't really offend people (depending where you are wearing it) because it's very youthful and safe in my opinion. <br />
<br />
Other: This is definitely a masculine fragrance, so i really couldn't see a women pulling this off. This fragrance would be best for school and going as if your a teenager. There aren't meany other occasions where you can pull this off because of the type of sweetness and synthetics. I wouldn't buy this fragrance in 2024 as there are just many other better options out there plus it's very boring and generic. Invictus is one of those fragrances you smell once and never really think about it again. Ther are much better options out there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2061713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2061713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061249" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kyer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1842538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kyer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Harmonist/Hypnotizing-Fire-36700.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.36700.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hypnotizing Fire"title="Hypnotizing Fire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061249ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061249" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1842538">Kyer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 13:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Crowd pleaser that stands strong even to this date. <br />
<br />
I still dont get any of the notes listed though, what I get with Invictus is a loud projecting fragrance that smells fresh and like bubblegum, cant find the marine aspect to it and the citrus is minimum but I really like what Im smelling. Maybe my nose is broken, I do not know.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2061249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2061249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059197" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059197" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Travis_Bickle"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818538.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Travis_Bickle" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059197ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059197" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818538">Travis_Bickle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-11">02/11/24 12:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my first designer fragrances. I'm not really the biggest fan of "blue" scents, but I love Invictus. Salty ocean, fresh citrus, and a nice musk. It also lasts forever and blasts off my skin for easily 10+ hours. Not sure why this gets the amount of hate it does, I find this to be a very good value with great performance especially for a "blue" scent profile.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2059197"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2059197#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's not "Fancy" but you will get complements.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2055177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2055177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055122" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ddot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1885193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1885193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ddot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); Don't know if it's the same with other people.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2055122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2055122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2055086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2055086" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DariaFrancesca74"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1537588.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DariaFrancesca74" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2055086ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2055086" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537588">DariaFrancesca74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-07">02/07/24 12:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Rabanne Invictus fragrance created by the collaboration of 4 great master noses represents an invincible meeting of evident fresh and penetrating tones, while, on the other, a sensual and spicy explosion awaits you. The blend is dominated by persuasive aquatic/marine accords which, initially, are linked to the essences of grapefruit peel and then replaced by virile bay leaves. The base of the eau de toilette is based on the fantastic combination of strong ingredients such as earthy patchouli, amber and guaiac wood. Ideal fragrance for young teenagers who love fragrances with great personality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2055086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2055086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2052727" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2052727" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mango0951"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1901369.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mango0951" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2052727ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2052727" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1901369">Mango0951</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 06:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rating:  (4/5)<br />
<br />
Paco Rabanne's Invictus is the embodiment of triumph, offering a dynamic and youthful fragrance experience. The opening notes of grapefruit and marine accords provide an invigorating burst of energy, perfect for daytime wear. As the fragrance evolves, the addition of bay leaf adds sophistication, making Invictus suitable for various occasions.<br />
<br />
The base notes of guaiac wood and ambergris create a warm and lasting foundation, ensuring the scent remains impactful throughout the day. Invictus excels in longevity, staying vibrant on the skin, and boasts a moderate sillage that leaves a noticeable yet balanced trail.<br />
<br />
The bottle, shaped like a trophy, visually represents the fragrance's victorious spirit. In conclusion, Invictus is a reliable choice for those seeking a fresh and powerful scent that mirrors a winning attitude, making a lasting impression wherever it's worn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2052727"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2052727#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049866" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellMasterBoss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961559"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961559.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellMasterBoss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cedrat-Boise-15211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat Boise"title="Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049866ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049866" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961559">SmellMasterBoss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-02">02/02/24 07:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells just nice a bit sweet, citrucy showergel vibes. It is good but I recomend you buy montblanc legend spirit, It smells very similar but better in every way other than the longevity. With invictus i get about 6- 7 hr and with legend spirit 5hrs, but thats with 3 sprays. Just spray 20 sprays and get good longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2049866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2049866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2049385" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2049385" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amunra"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1979091"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1979091.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Amunra" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zaharoff/Signature-Pour-Homme-56744.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56744.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Signature Pour Homme"title="Signature Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2049385ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2049385" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1979091">Amunra</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-01">02/01/24 17:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This stands out as a solid fragrance which holds its value to this day. If you forget everything else, this just smells good. It has excellent performance. And the opening to dry down is great. Every time I wear it I remind myself to never underestimate Invictus. When you smell it from the bottle it smells a little thicker and sweeter. However on skin I'm sometimes surprised when I get wafts like, is that me? There is a masculine vibe/depth that comes through which for me is primarily that Guaiac wood dressed with the moss and some patchouli. As it continues to dry down it just becomes that much more pleasant.<br />
<br />
In short, if you want to smell good, this is a great fragrance to own. Proven scent profile that is underrated and overanalyzed. And it still performs very, very well. It has stood the test of time and still works great.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2049385"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2049385#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048256" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Sweet with a mossy and woody dry down. Synthetic, yes but not in a bad way. I still get good performance in the current batches.<br />
<br />
Performance: 7<br />
Scent: 7.5<br />
Longevity: 8</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2029318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2029318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2025673" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is very attractive to me. It has a freshness, yet a deeper warmth and sweetness. A very well balanced perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2025673"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2025673#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2020043" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1914773">Peder.M.M</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-04">01/04/24 09:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think this fragrance is pretty underrated. It has a sweet yet fresh feeling to it and I personally think it smells really good. The people I have seen on social media really under appreciated this fragrance and puts the other in the line over this. To conclude l, I think this is a compliment getter fragrance and something to think about getting if all you want is a good smelling fragrance that doesnt cost to much money.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Smells pretty good. 8,5/10. Can blind buy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2014416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2014416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012854" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2012854" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jinjayagi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1945761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jinjayagi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2012854ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2012854" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1945761">jinjayagi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 03:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For day and night, although generic, I feel not many men are wearing this scent out. Despite the entertaining bottle shape, I wish the brand would be able to provide a bottle that is both entertaining while also fitting nicely without too much of a fear for breaking it - since this is a very good choice for young people, you must expect it to be handled away from some well-lit glass shelf at all times.<br />
<br />
Sadly, even though the fragrance is a real good killer in the most positive way, it irritates my skin about 10 seconds after spraying it. I don't even recall having an allergic reaction in my life and despite that my skin becomes itchy. Perhaps one of the ingredients that is making bad reviews about the synthetic aspect of this fragrance is what is doing this to my skin. This makes me very weirded out, but other than this, Invictus did well with the smell. It's good for others, but terrible to the wearer. Be careful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2012854"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2012854#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2002404" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2002404" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JeanPierree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724881"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1724881.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JeanPierree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2002404ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2002404" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1724881">JeanPierree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-15">12/15/23 23:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong performing, fresh, citrus &amp; sweet fragrance. Be mindful of over spraying as this is quite potent &amp; you may be trapped in a scent bubble. Would not suggest for work/office environment or more formal ocassions. However a good option for outings, clubbing - especially in warmer weather which will project this even more. -&gt; but if you're looking for a little less sweet, more aromatic the Platinum is more towards this end.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="2002404"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=2002404#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996014" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996014" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aisoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1554427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aisoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996014ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996014" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554427">aisoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 11:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was the first fragrance I ever got, I do not see how this is not a crowd pleaser.<br />
<br />
The first 15 minutes after spraying this, it's overall slightly salty and smells like sweet and aquatic grapefruit and jasmine. In a good way. The drydown turns more into an ambergris, floral and bubblegummy scent. In short; sweet, floral and aquatic.<br />
<br />
It's quite synthetic, but overall fine in my opinion and gives the beach vibe. The sillage is OK and lasts for like an hour or 2 then fades, overall longevity is 6 to 10 hours. Now, I see this more fit for the spring and summer, better for daytime. Occasion? Clubbing? Yes. Can be worn also in casual uses, like goin' out for a walk, but not really formal. Suited for the younger audience.<br />
<br />
If I gave this is a rating for what it is,<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1996014"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1996014#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994105" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Enthusiast think <br />
Let them wear some dirty OUD<br />
If you like it wear it <br />
I like it very much <br />
If you can grab your self older batch don't think twice<br />
Here are my thoughts on older batches<br />
<br />
Performance 10/10 <br />
Longevity 10/10<br />
Projection 10/10<br />
Versatility 10/10 <br />
Smell 10/10<br />
Compliment getter 20/10 <br />
Price 9/10 <br />
<br />
For small amounts of money you can get your sslf a older batch of this and enjoy.<br />
My GF loves this and i have not received a negative in this cologne.<br />
<br />
If you cant find a older batch don't fo for new one go for azzaro wanted edt or some other clone</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1992726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1992726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989414" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1989414" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="j-shades"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/279948"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.279948.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="j-shades" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Eclectic-Collections/Factor-7105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Factor"title="Factor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1989414ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1989414" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/279948">j-shades</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 19:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells exactly like Abercrombie First Instinct or I should say the other way around.. This one last way longer and more expensive. Its one of my GFs favorites</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1989414"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1989414#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982001" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1982001" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="elias.1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1900307"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1900307.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="elias.1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Ultra-Male-30947.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30947.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ultra Male"title="Ultra Male"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1982001ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1982001" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1900307">elias.1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-21">11/21/23 12:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really dont understand the negative feedback on this fragrance. Its definitely a people pleaser and has good longevity although I could say the same for projection. I have gotten several compliments on this. I really enjoy this fragrance. I wouldnt say its for clubbing only, for me this works to every occasion. This fragrance is fresh and sweet. The sea notes brings out this kind of synthetic smell which isnt nice if its right under your nose all day. I would recommend this for a younger audience as this is very sweet. <br />
<br />
Ps. Its not very formal so dont wear it to any fancy event. <br />
<br />
Smell: 10/10 <br />
Longevity: around 4-7 hours on my skin. <br />
Sillage: 6/10 <br />
Popularity: 9/10 I have heard people discuss about this fragrance and I know a lot of people who own it. Watch out for clones of this fragrance though, a lot of good ones because of its popularity. <br />
Reactions: 10/10 people love this and its a good compliment getter too. <br />
<br />
Overall: 9,5/10 projection could be better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1982001"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1982001#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1980920" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1980920" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bungulburt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848043"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1848043.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bungulburt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Valentino/Valentino-Uomo-Born-in-Roma-55963.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55963.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Valentino Uomo Born in Roma"title="Valentino Uomo Born in Roma"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1980920ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1980920" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1848043">bungulburt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-20">11/20/23 07:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample splasher off of Amazon (for some reason, I got a wild hair up my ass to collect mini-bottles). Tried it, liked it. Got the full sized thing.<br />
<br />
It starts off with a blast of juicy sweetness and dries down into a more floral bouquet. I don't really smell the citrus grapefruit stuff, but the aquatic notes are there. Very refreshing, and the drydown dulls it enough for this to be a fall scent (really heavy on the patchouli and jasmine). <br />
<br />
Overall, I don't see this as a special occasion scent. But it's a crowd pleaser. I don't think this would turn anyone off. A safe buy if you like sweet-masculine fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1980920"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1980920#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977854" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1623849">r0gerg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-16">11/16/23 06:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A classic summer fragrance, fresh, salty, clean, and slightly sweet. It has a sporty feel. Valentino Born in Rome it's very close to it but that has more salty notes. I love the grapefruit in the opening. The drydown it's sweet and ambery. The performance is good 8 hours in skin. 8/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1977854"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1977854#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1966777" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1952341" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JaxR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1837841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1837841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JaxR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Midnight-Poison-1282.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1282.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Midnight Poison"title="Midnight Poison"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1952341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1952341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1837841">JaxR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-15">10/15/23 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sharp, Synthetic and dries down to a foul sort of scent on me. I'd say it's best for the younger crowds, high school through college maybe. I dunno-it's not my bag at all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1952341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1952341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1947923" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="easyK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="easyK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1947923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1947923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824858">easyK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-09">10/09/23 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Synthetic, sharp, marine, straightforward, superb.<br />
If you prefer perfumes with 100 notes that require a week of wearing to fully 'unravel' the scent, this may not be for you, but you likely already know that. I adore marine accords, and this fragrance executes them perfectly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1947923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1947923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1941619" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1941619" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Smokeandhoney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696314"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1696314.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Smokeandhoney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1941619ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1941619" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1696314">Smokeandhoney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-01">10/01/23 05:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Olivier Polge??? Dominique Ropion???<br />
<br />
I agree with @4dri3n Invictus feels like a sport flanker of Eros.<br />
<br />
My husband who isnt that much into fragrances, went out and purchased this blind on his lunch break. He usually gravitates towards spicy, ambery, woody and smoky scents with hints of leather and musk. He came home from work wearing it and I instantly recoiled. He laughed and said I know. What have I done? But can you guess it? Seen as you *think* youre so good with perfume I knew the scent. Id smelt it somewhere before not difficult with this one because to me, it smells like every other generic designer mens marine freshie but this has a very distinct olfactory memory trigger. My old boss wore this. The kind of man in his 50s but acted as though he was still in his 20s, thought all the female staff wanted to sleep with him (they didnt) but particularly preferred the younger ones, thought his money was attractive but his breath smelt like something had died in his mouth. He left his top button undone on his shirt. Just a huge walking, talking, breathing ICK. I glared at my husband in utter agony and said its Invictus.<br />
<br />
nope</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1941619"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1941619#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1939865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is almost a vanilla-y, sweet note on the dry down which is delicious and sits wonderfully on his skin. My ph throws this one off (I had to try it), so I can understand the mixed reviews, but this is a girl approved scent. It's inoffensive, pleasant, and warm at worst.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1939198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1939198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1937528" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229332">denimherb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-24">09/24/23 15:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Try Rave Nardo Red (Rnr) by Lattafa. Invictus with sweet pineapple note. Surprisingly very good scent, 7not your typical Invictus. Longevity is also good, 6-8hrs especially when applied on clothes. And the price is perfectly cheap. Very nice quality for a cheapy fragrance. But I can't find any reviews or people talking about it maybe it's a new release? Anyways, if you have leads, try it if you are aiming to smell fresh and sweet with a  crowd pleasing dna. Worth for the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1936398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1936398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1935996" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1935996" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NamertBaykus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536428"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="NamertBaykus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1935996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1935996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1536428">NamertBaykus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-24">09/24/23 04:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't understand how people find this similar to Azzaro Wanted. Anyway, Invictus can be accurately described as a crowd pleaser, aquatic and youthful. If you aren't looking for a more mature scent and if you don't hate "generic blue fragrances", if you just want to feel fresh and smell nice, this is for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; They remind of eachother. Invictus is more "Blue", Azzaro is more "fruity", pineapple and spicy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1935884"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1935884#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1935159" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1935159" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="serbanalexandru1986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1543578.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="serbanalexandru1986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1935159ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1935159" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);
