padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1933433" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrantagent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1835465"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrantagent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sean-John/Unforgivable-2209.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2209.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Unforgivable"title="Unforgivable"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1933433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1933433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1835465">Fragrantagent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the bottles I reach for frequently. A pleasant sweet smell that plays off my skin well. While touted as a summer spring scent, it also suits crisp cool fall days.<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1933433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1933433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927102" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1838042">scent_of_sweden</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-13">09/13/23 12:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stickisch to the playbox where you keep all the pricey old toys, not to be forgotten, draped in a wet blanket of deep, deep sweet and suffocated in the feel not to play with them, because Paco Rabanne Invictus is garding the lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1927102"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1927102#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1926152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1926152" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ScentedAway"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754515"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ScentedAway" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/La-Couche-du-Diable-55547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Couche du Diable"title="La Couche du Diable"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1926152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1926152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1754515">ScentedAway</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-12">09/12/23 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Some kind of synthetic grape soda. Get this monstrosity away from me please! 2016 Invictus Aqua is much better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1926152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1926152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920905" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1920905" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wesenbergg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813485"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1813485.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="wesenbergg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1920905ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1920905" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1813485">wesenbergg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-06">09/06/23 01:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Paco Rabanne's Invictus is a fragrance that has garnered both praise and reservations. Here's a mixed review highlighting its strengths and shortcomings:<br />
<br />
First Impressions (4/5): The initial blast of Invictus is undoubtedly captivating. The blend of citrus and marine accords is invigorating and fresh, making it an appealing choice for those who prefer a zesty opening. However, for some, the intensity might be overwhelmingly cloying, bordering on the aggressive side.<br />
<br />
Longevity (3/5): While Invictus boasts decent longevity, it falls short of being truly exceptional. The scent remains noticeable for several hours but gradually fades, requiring reapplication for an all-day presence.<br />
<br />
Scent Profile (3/5): Invictus relies on a somewhat formulaic aquatic and spicy combination, which has been seen in various other fragrances. The initial freshness gives way to a more generic, middle-of-the-road scent as it dries down. It lacks the complexity and uniqueness that some fragrance enthusiasts seek.<br />
<br />
Versatility (4/5): One of Invictus' strong suits is its versatility. It can comfortably transition between casual and formal occasions, making it a reliable choice for everyday wear. It may not be groundbreaking, but it's a safe option for various settings.<br />
<br />
Bottle Design (2/5): While the bottle design attempts to be eye-catching with its trophy-inspired shape, it ultimately feels gimmicky and somewhat tacky. The flashy design tries to compensate for the lackluster contents inside.<br />
<br />
Compliment Factor (4/5): I've received numerous compliments while wearing Invictus. It's a fragrance that seems to draw people in, leaving a lasting impression. Whether from friends, colleagues, or strangers, the positive feedback is consistent.<br />
<br />
Overall (3/5): Paco Rabanne's Invictus is a fragrance with both merits and drawbacks. While it boasts an attention-grabbing opening and impressive versatility, it ultimately falls short in terms of longevity and originality. It's a fragrance that can certainly find its place in many collections, especially for those who prioritize freshness and mass appeal. However, for those seeking a more distinctive and enduring scent, Invictus may not be the ultimate victor. It's a safe choice, but one that doesn't quite reach the podium of fragrance excellence.<br />
<br />
Rating:  (3/5)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1920905"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1920905#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1920064" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1920064" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="4dri3n"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524525"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1524525.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="4dri3n" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1920064ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1920064" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1524525">4dri3n</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-05">09/05/23 04:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so often cited as influential or trend setting, but to me it smells kind of like a sport flanker of Eros, which came before it. Agree with others that this sits on the same branch of the fragrance family tree as both Eros and Y.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1920064"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1920064#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919716" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1919716" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PaddyOhFraiche"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557567"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1557567.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PaddyOhFraiche" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1919716ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1919716" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); cheap smelling. This is perfect for young men ages 14-21 in high school-college. I wouldnt wear it after that. A more mature alternative would be ADG Absolu which is basically this mixed with ADG dna.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1919716"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1919716#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917116" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saturnsays"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796433"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1796433.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="saturnsays" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Beau-De-Jour-Eau-de-Parfum-59064.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59064.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Beau De Jour Eau de Parfum"title="Beau De Jour Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796433">saturnsays</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-01">09/01/23 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So much better than I actually thought it would be since i normally find synthetic ambergris and aquatic notes repulsively  artificial. Having said that, most of the notes I encountered were top and middle, so there are definitely fixatives at play... fortunately quite subtle ones. I believe this is promoted as a men's fragrance; but, tbh, it's perfectly unisex to me, and that's why I like it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1917116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1917116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1915278" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jusknow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1610296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jusknow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1915278ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1915278" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1610296">jusknow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 08:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like candy in a good way. Light and airy, this would work amazing for a teenager. But adults can pull it off too. The best Invictus??</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1915278"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1915278#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912852" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tazwiz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780634"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tazwiz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Sillage-64105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Sillage"title="Club de Nuit Sillage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1780634">Tazwiz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-27">08/27/23 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Great performance, fresh, airy, clean, aquatic and sweet. The only bad thing is the synthetic opening that lasts about 30 minutes and sometimes could be a headache inducer. Other than that the drydown is very nice and mass appealing so don't hear the snobs</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1912852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1912852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1911396" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1911396" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Coughfee Guy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Coughfee Guy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1911396ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1911396" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1823044">Coughfee Guy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 14:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm very difficult with fragrance. I've smelled hundreds in stores and this is the only one I've ever bought so far. It's a great warm weather/active fragrance. Funny enough I see on here that snobs hate it but I've only gotten compliments. Seems to be the same as any other hobbyist who's been smelling their own farts too much like a barista or car guy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1911396"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1911396#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1909893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1909893" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Speeedyian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1806588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1806588.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Speeedyian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1909893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1909893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1806588">Speeedyian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-23">08/23/23 18:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its hard for me to not like this fragrance, and also dont get the hate behind it. Its one of the best smelling Ive come across for a fresh and good-smelling cologne. Its great for summer and spring and thats about it since the notes really shine there. It has such a great drydown as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1909893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1909893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908535" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908535" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Afc_Croatian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1370156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Afc_Croatian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-Intense-62318.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62318.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre Intense"title="Libre Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908535ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908535" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1370156">Afc_Croatian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fragrance snobs strike again with Paco Rabane's Invictus.<br />
<br />
Released in 2013, it has become a household name ever since and continues to sell endless amounts around the world. Frag heads wish they could crash their shitty Nissan Altima into the Paco Rabane store if it meant preventing further sales of this beast of a scent.<br />
<br />
Invictus is undoubtedly a compliment-puller, mass-appealing, sweet and sexy bomb. Don't let the rating fool you, that orange and aquatic opening is incredibly pleasing. Synthetic to some, but a signature scent to many.<br />
<br />
If you're an extrovert and actually like to leave your home instead of hating on colognes all day, chances are you will run into this on the street. The trifectas of party fragrances are Sauvage, 1 Million and Invictus.<br />
<br />
Notice how many Paco Rabane's are compliment-getters and best-sellers? That's because PR knows their audience, someone who likes to have a good time on a night out or maybe enjoys attention. Nothing wrong with owning a fragrance like that.<br />
Next time you decide that you don't want to smell like a zoo, get a Paco Rabane fragrance.<br />
<br />
8.3/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1908535"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1908535#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1904375" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1904375" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Louie_098"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447805"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Louie_098" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1904375ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1904375" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447805">Louie_098</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-17">08/17/23 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is my signature scent and the most complimented one in my collection. I've already gone through one 3.4 oz bottle, and my second one is almost empty - I've got a 6.7 oz backup ready to go! There's something about this fragrance that works magic on my skin.<br />
<br />
My family and friends have come to associate me with this scent, and sometimes I wish I didn't have a collection and just wore this one. I've received countless compliments, with people telling me I smell like a married man or expressing their wish that all men smelled like this. One woman even followed me because of this scent! Before COVID, some women in my college classes would politely ask to sit next to me so they could enjoy the fragrance. I used to carry a decant in my book bag, and some of my female classmates would ask to try it on - and they loved it!<br />
<br />
I'm running out of superlatives to describe this fragrance. Trust me when I say it's worth buying. The compliments speak for themselves.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1904375"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1904375#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903509" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1903509"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1903509#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1896807" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1896807" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ideal.my.fav"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256672"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ideal.my.fav" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Invictus"title="Invictus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1896807ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1896807" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256672">ideal.my.fav</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-08">08/08/23 03:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now I got vintage formula and the recent formula bottles together. 2014 and 2022 batches.<br />
<br />
At the opening they are pretty similar, vintage is a tad bit stronger maybe. After that you get the massive difference. Recent bittle is more transparent and airy while the vintage scent is more puchy and the oakmoss gives the composition a nice solid structure. Recent scent has more calone in it. Vintage bottle performance is massive and the recent bottles performance is still really good but not as good as the vintage.<br />
<br />
I will use the 2022 bottle for indoor and gym mkre and vintage for any other things.<br />
<br />
Overall I still find the revent batches worth it. Maybe even better for some people who like lighter scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1896807"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1896807#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1886695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1262132">am2000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-25">07/25/23 10:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is nothing of its former self, happening far too much in perfumery now, longevity and silage is nothing compared to what it was 5-10 years ago, it doesnt even smell the same, theyve completely reformulated it, will never buy this again until they bring the old invictus back</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881538" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="soumayaela"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1267987"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="soumayaela" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881538ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881538" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); Smells very nice in hot and humid climate <br />
One of the best "blue" fragrances in the market <br />
Yes it's generic yes it smells like a lot of multiple perfumes in the market but it does its job and gets compliments <br />
Vey versatile <br />
Easy to wear and easy to smell (by people around) <br />
I gifted it so many times and was a hit, since it's mainstream and everyone seem to enjoy it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1881538"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1881538#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880383" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1758586">ambadeblou</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-15">06/15/23 02:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample of it and i thank God that it was just a sample, not a blind buy.<br />
Very cloying, sticky and sadly very long lasting on my skin and clothes <br />
For the price, you have better options imho</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1856671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1856671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1855331" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1855331" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Psalzarulo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Psalzarulo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1855331ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1855331" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203">Psalzarulo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-13">06/13/23 09:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really expecting to like the Original Invictus as I really liked Invictus Victory. Unfortunately, this just smells like a generic, synthetic sweet/aqua scent to me. It's definitely not bad but and would be a pretty great blind buy aqua lovers, particularly sweet ones. I'm getting a tiny background of woody/earthy notes but not enough to make this stand out. Easy 7.5/10 that would be fine on anyone but nothing to get too cited about.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1855331"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1855331#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1852932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1852932" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.14736.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="flem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Theodoros-Kalotinis/Alluring-Fig-68196.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68196.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alluring Fig"title="Alluring Fig"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1852932ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1852932" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14736">flem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 17:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive heard people call this bubble gum-like. I'm not sure if Id call it that, but I see what they are implying. Its sweet in the way that JOOP! is sweet: cloying, synthetic, and fruity (like one of those syrupy fruit cups that come in prepackaged cups of 4 from grocery stores). I often read online or watch videos where people can smell certain scents everywhere. That never rang true for me until now. Ive definitely smelled this many times and never knew it. A 16-24 year old guy with gel in their hair, lots of inexpensive jewelry, probably a tank top, and a beater with a body kit. Thats exactly what this smells like. That guy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1852932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1852932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1851805" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
People liken the bubblegum sweetness to something in the realm of Ultra Male by JPG (which I love), but I didn't get any of that. Not long Into the opening/drydown the smell of this reminded me of an old lady in a nursing home. Did not strike me as young, fresh, masculine and sweet like everyone says.<br />
<br />
Invictus Platinum, however, seemed much more in line with that youthful sweet playful vibe that people claim this possesses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1848112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1848112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1845792" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Maybe covid messed with people's noses? I smell a soft marine scent similar to Valentino Uomo Born in Roma but softer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1845792"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1845792#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1841430" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1841430" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cholera"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1747706.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cholera" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1841430ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1841430" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1747706">Cholera</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-25">05/25/23 07:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, sweet citrus bubblegum DNA which is pretty unique and youthful. I am not the biggest fan of it but it is fun, pleasant and mass-appealing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1841430"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1841430#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1841194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1841194" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marcosamuel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757089.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marcosamuel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-31861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage"title="Sauvage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1841194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1841194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757089">Marcosamuel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-25">05/25/23 00:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Invictus de Paco Rabanne<br />
<br />
Un aroma que descubr por primera vez cuando peinaba junto a mi padre tiendas donde vendan fragancias. Aquella vez buscaba algo juvenil, pero tambin elegante, con un toque deportivo. Al regresar a casa el aroma en la muestra de papel no dejaba de mejorar con el pasar de la horas, y al transcurrir los das las rfagas de aroma se desprendan de tanto en tanto volviendome loca la nariz.<br />
<br />
Para m ha sido un golazo el haber conocido esta fragancia, en primer lugar, porque me encanta su aroma: me brinda esa sensacin de frescura, masculinidad, juventud y ultra limpieza gracias a sus aromas ctricos, marinos y salados. En segundo lugar, porque da ms de lo que su condicin (de agua de colonia) suelen dar, puesto que es potente, dura y hasta viene en botella de 200 ml.<br />
<br />
Invictus, como mencione, es un colonia potente en salida, de buena proyeccin y duracin para su relacin calidad/precio, teniendo en cuenta que no es un EDP.<br />
<br />
Me parece ideal para salir en noches frescas, tardes de compras, incluso maanas con sol, rumbo a la playa o incluso al campo. As mismo, los cumplidos no se hacen esperar. He tenido excelente recepcin por parte de hombres y mujeres, aunque a las mujeres les gusta ms.<br />
<br />
Respecto a las experiencias, gustos y espectativas ajenas hay quienes no les agrada porque la sensacin que se percibe en el olfato (medianamente entrenado) es que es muy juvenil y qumica. Bueno, es cierto, pero eso, en mi humilde opinin, no es una desventaja para nada. Adems, tambin me ha pasado con otros aromas que a m me fascinan pero que a otros hombres no, no por ello dejo o dejar de usarlos, sino ms bien las disfruto indiferentemente. Tambin tengamos en cuenta el aspecto fundamental de la variable del PH, que en cada persona es muy distinto el resultado.<br />
<br />
Entonces, la volvera a comprar?... Por supuesto! (Invictus Leyend tambin es una excelente opcin).<br />
<br />
Lo recomiendo 100% para jovenes y hombres que van desde los 20 a 40 aos, y para primeras citas. El aroma de Invictus transmite un halo de aquello que se busca al conocer a alguien: frescura, fluidez, conexin... y un toque de intensidad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1841194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1841194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1837645" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1837645" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lukd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731932"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lukd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1837645ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1837645" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1731932">lukd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-20">05/20/23 06:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I enjoy this fragrance as it has complex elements of grapefruit, mandarin and the ocean breeze. This fragrance is a great luxury beginner's scent that is versatile for men up to the age of 30.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1837645"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1837645#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1831541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723096">spodongle</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-12">05/12/23 13:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like a deep, graceful musky ocean.<br />
very masculine and appealing.<br />
people and reviewers tend to overshadow this fragrance due to the many flankers released in the Invictus line.<br />
I would consider wearing this on a 60 degree, middle of the pack type of day.<br />
7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1831541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1831541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1827114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1229646">Bear Claws</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-04">05/04/23 19:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a vomit after big sugar coma, I think its a really bad combo of some extra sweet sugary notes and some really bad clashing green/marine notes, it feels very syrupy as well and thats not helping the cause, never understood about the hype , I think its either love or hate with this one, there is nothing in between.  Very unpleasant to my nose, nauseating, chances are most casual users will find this repellent and revolting, be careful. I would describe this as  bubble gum (which is lets be honest not the most pleasant smell to begin with) combined with very potent and harsh green herbs. Never smelled it? Dont you dare blind buy it (even any flankers), you will be a fool. <br />
People comparing this to Hawas is an insult,  Hawas is a superstar, very refreshing , easy to like and process, sweet but mellow and not annoying, has captivating factor, works all year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330655">RogueZXRO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-02">05/02/23 20:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A great fragrance that reminds of a less powdery legend spirit. Got a good deal on it for $60 for the 200ml. Nothing crazy impressive but a nice mass-pleasing scent. Would I rebuy it? No, but might try the flankers when I finish this massive bottle. Love wearing it to the gym. Also, girls love this stuff for some reason, so might rebuy it if I finish it, just because.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1823530"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1823530#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1823048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1823048" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Commander444"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1533005.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Commander444" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1823048ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1823048" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); Sweet and Fresh is the best combination and this masterpiece nailed it. Don't listen to fragrance snobs, they're half retarded. This is great, it's strong so don't douse yourself in it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1823048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1823048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1820248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1820248" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1820248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1820248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#253 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
<br />
I really like the scent and it holds up for hours. Full disclosure, I have nearly every scent in the above "People who like this also like" row, so I clearly have a type that leans citrus/male/Versace/D&amp;G, and this scent is definitely all that. Not as sweet as Paco's One Million, which though it is not my thing I wore for a couple of years because a girlfriend liked it on me (I haven't repurchased it since I said bye-bye-bye to her). Despite that I enjoy this Invictus scent a lot I almost didn't get it because of the silly trophy container. Having that sitting on the vanity says nothing good about you, so I keep it hidden in a drawer. And FYI, as well as this holds up, the clone by Maison Alhambra "Victorioso" smells the same and has better longevity for $22.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1820248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1820248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1819706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1819706" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Omer.gok"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676036"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676036.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Omer.gok" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1819706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1819706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676036">Omer.gok</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-28">04/28/23 01:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The only bad thing is that it is widespread and popular :D . It's synthetic but who cares if others like it. It's good to have a few in your collection that you don't have to think too much about. The original is the best and versatile for all seasons except winter. Only for casual wear. Victory is good for winter. Aqua performs badly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1819706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1819706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1817213" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1817213" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siurkus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1730368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siurkus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Intense-Man-34696.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.34696.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Intense Man"title="Club de Nuit Intense Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1817213ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1817213" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1730368">Siurkus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-25">04/25/23 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing fresh and light scent. Not super overpowering and if you are someone who likes sweeter scents this is definitely one to try out. While I was rather hesitant after reading some reviews and seeing the price for a 3.4oz bottle, I tested it out and didn't understand where the hate was coming from. The smell is amazing and the bottle has character as well. The only real problem I have come across with this is that the projection is not the best. Otherwise a very solid fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="18471"comment_id="1817213"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-18471.html?ccid=1817213#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1814707" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
